mean_cn: n. 纵横字谜，纵横填字谜
mean_en: is a word game in which you work out the answers and write them in the white squares of a pattern of small black and white squares.
word_etyma: cross交错 + word词语 → crossword 纵横字谜
sentence: These crossword puzzles are so hard! I'm terrible at them.
sentence_trans: 这些纵横字谜太难了！我不擅长。
